text: Problem 4.18 The space between the plates of a parallel-plate capacitor (Fig. 4.24) is filled with two slabs of linear dielectric material. Each slab has thickness a, so the total distance between the plates is 2a. Slab 1 has a diclectric constant of 2, and slab 2 has a dielectric constant of 1.5. The free charge density on the top plate is & and on the bottom plate â€”o.
